singleBlog.title: Hear the River Poetry Event
singleBlog.description: An afternoon of readings at the Durham Art Gallery featuring four powerful voices: Catherine Graham, Frances Boyle, Murgatroyd Monaghan, and Laurie Koensgen. Hosted by Rebecca Diem.

singleBlog.title: Local Author Book Fair
singleBlog.description: Visit the Owen Sound & North Grey Union Public Library for a multi-genre showcase taking over the entire library! Meet local authors, get your books signed, win prizes, and celebrate reading.

singleBlog.title: The Poet Laureate's Community Revue
singleBlog.description: Immerse yourself in a world of poetry and art featuring Owen Sound Poet Laureate Rebecca Diem & friends! This weekend-long event showcases the power of creative collaboration with a multi-arts exhibit and an exclusive matinee performance. Get ready to be inspired!
singleBlog.location: Harmony Centre | Owen Sound, ON | Free
